document_data.mainbody:
ome of the Forgotten Realms novels have been released as audio books.
*Icewind Dale Trilogy 01 - The Crystal Shard
*Icewind Dale Trilogy 02 - Streams of Silver
*Icewind Dale Trilogy 03 - The Halflings Gem
*The Dark Elf Trilogy 01 - Homeland
*The Dark Elf Trilogy 02 - Exile
*The Dark Elf Trilogy 03 - Sojourn
*Forgotten Realms 01 - Canticle
*Forgotten Realms 02 - In Sylvan Shadows
*Forgotten Realms 03 - Night Masks
*Forgotten Realms 04 - The Fallen Fortress
*Forgotten Realms 05 - The Chaos Curse
*Legacy of the Drow 01 - The Legacy
*Legacy of the Drow 02 - Starless Night
*Legacy of the Drow 03 - Siege of Darkness
*Legacy of the Drow 04 - Passage to Dawn
*Paths of Darkness 01 - The Silent Blade
*Paths of Darkness 02 - The Spine of the World
*Paths of Darkness 03 - Servant of the Shard
*Paths of Darkness 04 - Sea of Swords
*The Hunter’s Blades Trilogy 01 - The Thousand Orcs
*The Hunter’s Blades Trilogy 02 - The Lone Drow
*The Hunter’s Blades Trilogy 03 - The Two Swords
